root.name: Martial Heroes
root.description: Character classes Warrior Warriors specialize in close combat and multi kill martial arts. Their primary weapons choice includes a simitar, axe and a lance. Important attributes for the warrior class are strength, vitality, and agility. AssassinThe assassin is currently the only female class available in the game. They specialize in quick and one-hit kill martial arts. Their primary weapons choice includes a bow, claw and a dagger. Important attributes for the assassin class are strength, agility, and dexterity. MageThe mage class is specialized in wielding natural forces but are also able to wield weapons. Their primary weapons choice includes a sword, fan and glove. Important attributes for a mage class are dexterity, agility, and intelligence. MonkThe monk class can specialize in many different arts such as blessings, healing and offense martial arts using a staff. Their primary weapon choice includes the rod/staff, maul/plummet and the flying wheel. Important attributes for the monk class are dexterity, intelligence, and vitality.
